description: 2K has reaffirmed its support for 3rd-person action roguelike shooter Project Ethos, and has appointed the former executive producer for Apex Legends as the new studio head of developer 31st Union.

description: PlaySide and Fumi Games showed up for IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025 to premiere a behind-the-scenes gameplay trailer for its black-and-white boomer shooter, Mouse: P.I. For Hire.

description: In IGN’s latest digital cover story, the new Geralt of Rivia, actor Liam Hemsworth, and The Witcher showrunner Lauren Schmidt Hissrich speak out on casting changes, a "refresh" of the Netflix show, and crafting "a really good payoff to the series" as they head into its final two seasons.
title: The Witcher’s Final Seasons: Liam Hemsworth and Showrunner Lauren Schmidt Hissrich on Replacing Henry Cavill and Crafting ‘A Really Good Payoff to the Series’

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: David Jaumandreu and I are supposed to be having our interview about his upcoming game, Denshattack, in a studio built out to look like a train. And we will, eventually, as you’ll see from the video above. But before we shoot the video version, we chat for my written piece in a very different setting: a dungeon.
title: Denshattack! Is Tony Hawk With Japanese Trains, for Train-Lovers, by Train-Lovers

description: Soft Rains made an appearance at IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025 to announce that Ambrosia Sky Act 1 has a November 2025 release date for PC via Steam.

author: Michael Cripe
description: The Outer Worlds 2 has a lot of guns, so developer Obsidian Entertainment stopped by IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025 to give fans a sneak peek at the arsenal they’ll have at their disposal when launch arrives later this month.

description: A selection of horror games (and lighter spooky games) are on sale right now at Amazon ahead of Halloween. Stock up on some options to play this month.

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: With the upcoming movie Predator: Badlands set for release next month, the question of a new Predator video game is more pressing than ever. It turns out, director Dan Trachtenberg, who also doubles as a sort of Predator showrunner for the franchise, wants a new Predator video game just as much as fans do.
title: 'I Hope It Could Happen' — Predator: Badlands Director Dan Trachtenberg 'Desperate' for an Uncharted or Assassin's Creed-Style Predator Video Game | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Dan Trachtenberg’s Predator: Badlands was inspired by a number of video games. The director has said 2005 PlayStation masterpiece Shadow of the Colossus inspired the relationship between the film’s young Predator, called Dek, and Elle Fanning’s character, a Weyland-Yutani synth he must carry around. Now, add World of Warcraft to the mix.
title: Predator: Badlands Director Says the Predator's New Laser Sword Was Inspired by the Demon Hunter's Warglaive From World of Warcraft | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: Michael Cripe
description: Bitmap Bureau has published a new Terminator 2D: No Fate trailer as part of IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025 that shows off how next month’s arcade-inspired action game reimagines the events of Terminator 2: Judgment Day with remixed events.

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Remember that fake AI actress Tilly Norwood? The one that sparked a Hollywood backlash? Well, one actor is taking a stand against her, albeit a funny one: Ryan Reynolds. The Deadpool actor announced his company Mint Mobile’s first foray into providing Wifi, and he found a real-life actress named Tilly Norwood to help him out.
title: Deadpool Star Ryan Reynolds Enlists a Real Tilly Norwood for New Mint Mobile Ad Amid AI Actress Backlash

description: Gearbox developers have been addressing disgruntled Borderlands 4 players who have questioned the need to nerf overpowered builds in the mostly single-player looter shooter, saying it’s necessary to preserve the challenge and encourage build “diversity.”
title: As Borderlands 4 Players Brace Themselves for the End of the OP Crit Knife, Gearbox Developers Explain Why Nerfs Are Needed Even in Mostly Single-Player Games

description: The Astronaut review: Kate Mara, Laurence Fishburne and Gabriel Luna star in this slow burn slog about a NASA astronaut who violently returns to Earth with no recollection of what happened *up there*.

description: The Outer Worlds 2 global release times are confirmed, including Early Access. Here's when you'll be able to play in your timezone.

description: October's list of PlayStation Plus games has been leaked online, and will reportedly include the 2024 remake of horror classic Until Dawn.

author: Michael Cripe
description: Battlefield 6 launched to impressive player numbers just last week, but EA’s latest entry in the long-running FPS series is facing one issue that has players missing more shots than they should be.

author: Tom Phillips
description: The Matrix star Joe Pantoliano has said he was "lied" to by the Wachoskis about his character Cypher's fate.
title: The Matrix Star Still Upset Over Character's Death, Says Wachowskis 'F***ing Lied' About His Fate

author: Vikki Blake
description: Fans across the world are paying tribute to "titan of soul" D'Angelo, who died yesterday aged 51 after an undisclosed battle with cancer. D'Angelo was behind the hugely popular Red Dead Redemption 2 track, Unshaken, and fans of the game as well as developer Rockstar paid tribute following the news.
title: Rockstar Games, Red Dead Redemption 2 Fans Pay Tribute to D'Angelo, Who Has Died Aged 51

author: Tom Phillips
description: Frankenstein star Mia Goth has said that Marvel's decision to delay its long-awaited Blade reboot and retool the movie's story was "for the best."
title: Marvel's Blade Star Mia Goth Says The Movie's Continued Delays Were 'For The Best'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: It is one of Matthew McConaughey’s most iconic scenes, one that has endured as both a prime example of his acting prowess and a meme. But Interstellar’s tape scene was not heavily rehearsed. Nor did McConaughey have to go through multiple takes to get the emotional reaction we see on-screen. McConaughey in fact nailed it on the first take, and he didn’t rehearse the scene at all.
title: 'I Just Reacted… I Didn't Want to Know What Was Coming' — Matthew McConaughey Says the Iconic Tape Scene in Interstellar Is the First Take, and He Did It Without Rehearsing

author: Michael Cripe
description: Battlefield 6 players haven’t decided what their favorite weapons are yet, but they’ve already fallen in love with a new movement tech called “ladder launching.”
title: Battlefield 6 'Ladder Launching' Will Get Patched, but That Hasn't Stopped Players From Having Fun While It Lasts

author: Robert Anderson
description: You can now buy Xbox Game Pass Ultimate at a discount from Amazon, but it likely won't last long.
title: Amazon Has Quietly Dropped Game Pass Prices Again, and It Might Be Your Last Chance to Lock In This Discount

author: Adam Mathew
description: My pile of games already stretches past the moon, but some discounts just hit that "add to cart" button for you.
title: AU Deals: Stock Up on the Cheapest Must Plays That Are Pile of Shame Proof
